attributes.action: introduce a National Funding Formula for all schools to give every child entitlement to a properly resourced education, wherever they may live.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current funding system for state schools is unfair, outdated and indefensible. Similar schools in different Authorities currently have enormous differences in their funding. A National Funding Formula, allowing for differences in socio-economic circumstances, regional living costs, etc. and taking account of the actual learning needs of each age group, is long overdue.
